sentences.sContent: Of the 28 hospitals that changed their policies to become smoke free, tobacco-related health problems, seclusion and restraint, and use of coercion or threats all declined significantly, they said.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of the 28 hospitals that changed their policies to become smoke free, tobacco-related health problems, seclusion and restraint, and use of coercion or threats all declined significantly, they said.
sentences.sCn: 研究人员说，这28家医院采取了禁烟政策以后，因香烟引起的健康问题以及隔离，限制，强迫或者威胁的使用次数，都有显著地下降。
